explains: n. 消除，排除；淘汰；消灭，铲除；排泄
wordGroup: noise elimination 消声；噪声消除
gaussian elimination 高斯消去法，高斯消元法
elimination reaction 消除反应；消去反应

sentences.en: Find which food you are allergic to by a process of elimination.
sentences.cn: 用排除法找出你对哪种食物过敏。

sentences.en: Though it may give some benefit to the poor, its key component is the elimination of tax on dividends.
sentences.cn: 尽管它可能会给穷人带来一些好处，但它的关键因素是取消股息税。

sentences.en: We suspect that spending would come down through elimination of a lot of unnecessary or even dangerous tests and treatments.
sentences.cn: 我们怀疑消除许多不必要甚至危险的检测和治疗，会让支出下降。
